Desc.entry: A registered charity and hostel for 8 women only, ex-offenders, aged 16 years and over, providing accommodation for up to 2 years. Referral through Probation Service or social worker. In addition there is a mother and baby flat.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Fri 9am-5pm; Service users meetings held every 4 weeks, or when needed in emergencies, please contact for further details

category.entry: HOUSING, ADVICE AND SUPPORT FOR HOMELESS OR VULNERABLE PEOPLE
